text: Cop Land is a 1997 American crime thriller movie directed by James Mangold and starring Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Robert Patrick, Peter Berg, Frank Vincent, Edie Falco, Janeane Garofalo, Cathy Moriarty, Deborah Harry, Victor Williams. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1997 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by James Mangold Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about police misconduct
title: Cop Land
